fields.description:
There is an odd bugs that's happening for quite some time now. If you create an Alloy app with a list-view (may apply to other elements as well) and style it via a style (e.g. background-color), the style is not applied, unless you reference it via an ID. See the attachment for our workaround:

 !Bildschirmfoto 2020-12-08 um 13.06.46.png|thumbnail!
fields.summary: Alloy: Style not applied to ListView if not referenced via ID
